sentences.en: ...despite a slight diminution in asset value.
Age brought a gradual diminution of his strength and energy.
sentences.cn: 年龄使他的体力和精力逐渐减退.

sentences.en: Any local diminution of blood supply will delay or prevent healing.
sentences.cn: 任何局部供血的减少将延迟或阻碍愈合.

sentences.en: But there was no diminution in the loftiness of his feeling for her.
sentences.cn: 但是他对她的崇高感情并未因此而变化.

sentences.en: He experienced no diminution of his physical strength.
Provision for diminution in value of foreign investment are the number of ready?
sentences.cn: 对外投资计提的减值准备是 多少 ?

sentences.en: Recoverable pecuniary damage is a diminution of the victim's patrimony caused by the damaging event.
sentences.cn: 可回复的财产损害指受害人在损害事件中遭受的财物的减少.

sentences.en: The amount lost by gradual diminution or waste.
sentences.cn: 消耗量逐渐损耗或浪费而失去的量.

sentences.en: The consequence of course , is diminution of public trust in these once august institutions.
sentences.cn: 这种进程的后果 当然 是减低了这些曾经是令人敬畏的院校的公共机构的公信力.

sentences.en: They would point a diminution in the frequency of global financial crises this decade.
sentences.cn: 他们还会指出,这十年中全球金融危机的发生频率在降低.

words.tran_cn: 爱称；指小词；身材极小的人

trans.tran_en: a reduction in the size, number, or amount of something
